DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate Diabetes data management program hand potential user , lay person healthcare professional . With data management system glucose result DIDGET TM meter upload secure website use adult diabetes , parent guardian child diabetes , health care professional monitor diabetes recognize trend pattern blood sugar level .
DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes data management program upload glucose meter result computer provide information lay person health care professional . With data management system glucose result DIDGET TM meter upload secure website use adult diabetes , parent guardian child diabetes , health care professional monitor diabetes recognize trend pattern blood sugar level . During study subject perform specific task , upload meter result display report . The study evaluate subject ' success use software program , program 's ease use , clarity usefulness user instruction , user satisfaction diabetes data management program .
DOC.criteria: Lay user must : 1 . Be least 18 year age 2 . Have diabetes parent legal guardian child diabetes 3 . Be test blood sugar home least twice daily least one month parent legal guardian child test blood sugar home least twice daily least one month 4 . Be able speak , read , understand English 5 . Have experience use PC , navigate software program , browse internet Healthcare professional must : 1 . Have experience use internet 2 . Have experience use diabetes data management software medical office 1 . Person work competitive medical device company 2 . Person cognitive disorder condition , opinion investigator , would put person risk compromise integrity study .
